Kim Ki Nam Meets Chinese Delegation
articles.content:
CPC Officials Here  
   Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- Liu Yunshan, member of the Political Bureau, member of the Secretariat and head of the Publicity Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, and his party arrived here Monday.
